A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Oh god\, what have they done to this series? It's like a star wars film made by someone that's never ever seen or heard of the original trilogy....
Its full of plot holes\, such as finn waking from a coma and suddenly begin able to fly... To the utterly garbage way they treated luke in this film.... Who has apparently forgetting literally everything that happened to him in the first trilogy... I wanted my money back after this crap fest
We have turbo laser blasts that "fall".. Because of space gravity apparently\, a deus ex machina endings\,... Leais Mary Poppins impression... (think yondu in GOTG2... "I'm Mary Poppins y'all)... Ugh\, I can't even go on\, it's awful and it's just not star wars 

Avoid like a case of herpes\, it sucks major ass
